documentation.text: The ZDAOFactory contract is designed to produce and track individual ZDAO contracts*

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Name Error: This DAO name is already taken"

arguments.value: Name Error: This DAO name is already taken

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Name Error: This DAO name is already taken"

documentation.text: The ZDAOFactory contract is designed to produce and track individual ZDAO contracts*

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Name Error: This DAO name is already taken"

arguments.value: Name Error: This DAO name is already taken

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Name Error: This DAO name is already taken"

createZDAO(string,string,string,address,.details: this function can create a rep token for the new DAO OR use an existing ERC20 token

params._daoName: is the name of the DAO being created
params._existingToken: is the address of an existing ERC20 token that can represent the DAO's rep (this would be set to 0x0 if not applicapble)
params._proposalTime: is the time in seconds that a proposal will be active for*
params._quorum: is the minimum percentage of voteWeight needed for a vote to pass
params._tokenName: is the name of the DAO's rep token(leave blank if using an existing token)
params._tokenSym: is the symbol of the DAO's rep token(leave blank if using an existing token)
params.transferableRep: is a bool representing whether or not the rep token is transferable

isDAOnameTaken(string).details: this is a view only function for front end use

params._daoName: is the proposed name of a DAO

returns._0: a bool(true/false) for whether or not a DAO with the input name exists*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

retrieveZDAO(string).details: this is a view only function for front end use

params._daoName: is the name of the DAO who's address is being retrieved

retrieveZDAOToken(string).details: this is a view only function for front end use

params._daoName: is the name of the DAO who's token address is being retrieved

returns._0: the address of the DAO rep token*

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createZDAO(string,string,string,address,.notice: createZDAO is a public function that allows a user to create their own zDAO

isDAOnameTaken(string).notice: isDAOnameTaken is used to determine if a name for a DAO is currently in use

retrieveZDAO(string).notice: retrieveZDAO is used to retrieve a DAO's address by its name

retrieveZDAOToken(string).notice: retrieveZDAOToken is used to retrieve a DAO's rep token address by its name

userdoc.notice: The ZDAOFactory contract is designed to produce and track individual ZDAO contracts*
